title: Joy, Happiness and Mindfulness: 35 Daily Reflections for a Calmer Life
description: This book was written during a time of reflection. It takes the reader through my reflective journey of 35 days of practice and reflection.The readers are invited read the reflections and then write their own reflection of the day.The 35 day journey will help to shape your life by identifying the experiences and people that are important for you to live your authentic life.
author: Shamena Maharaj
